mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(SUM((money_new - money_old)+(ruby_new - ruby_old)), 0) FROM rd_data.tb_member_wallet_ruby where `type` = 1 ) AS sum_charge_cnt ,(SELECT IFNULL(SUM((money_new - money_old)+(ruby_new - ruby_old)), 0) FROM rd_data.tb_member_wallet_ruby where `type` = 5 ) AS sum_input_cnt ,(SELECT IFNULL(SUM((money_new - money_old)+(ruby_new - ruby_old)), 0) FROM rd_data.tb_member_wallet_ruby where `type` in (7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 16, 18, 22, 23) ) AS sum_event_cnt ,(SELECT IFNULL(SUM((money_new - money_old)+(ruby_new - ruby_old)), 0) FROM rd_data.tb_member_wallet_ruby where `type` in (2, 3, 4, 14, 17, 19, 20) ) AS sum_output_cnt ,(SELECT IFNULL(SUM((money_new - money_old)+(ruby_new - ruby_old)), 0) FROM rd_data.tb_member_wallet_ruby where `type` = 6 ) AS sum_change_cnt ,IFNULL((SELECT IFNULL(ruby_new, 0) FROM rd_data.tb_member_wallet_ruby where mem_no = #{mem_no} and `type`=15),0) AS start_cnt ,IFNULL(ruby, 0) AS sum_own_cnt FROM rd_data.tb_member_wallet WHERE mem_no = #{mem_no}

SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rowNum, r.* FROM ( SELECT a.gubun ,ABS(a.ruby) AS ruby ,a.ruby_new ,a.ruby_old ,a.room_no ,a.mem_no ,a.item_type ,a.`level` ,a.`grade` ,a.giftDate ,a.secret ,b.item_image AS itemImage ,IFNULL(b.item_name, a.cont) AS itemName ,a.itemCnt ,b.item_thumbnail ,c.mem_userid AS userId ,c.mem_nick AS nickName ,c.mem_sex ,c.inner ,c.mem_birth_year FROM ( SELECT (CASE item_type WHEN 1 THEN 2 WHEN 2 THEN 3 WHEN 4 THEN 9 WHEN 5 THEN 6 WHEN 7 THEN 14 WHEN 8 THEN 2 WHEN 10 THEN 32 ELSE item_type END) AS gubun ,ruby ,'' AS ruby_new ,'' AS ruby_old ,room_no ,(CASE item_type WHEN 1 THEN 2 WHEN 2 THEN 3 WHEN 4 THEN 9 WHEN 5 THEN 6 WHEN 7 THEN 14 WHEN 8 THEN 2 WHEN 10 THEN 32 ELSE item_type END) AS item_type ,gifted_mem_no AS mem_no ,mem_level AS `level` ,mem_grade AS grade ,last_upd_date AS giftDate ,item_code ,item_cnt AS itemCnt ,secret ,if(item_type=5,concat('교환 ', ruby),'') AS cont FROM rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_item WHERE mem_no=#{mem_no} AND item_type not in ( '3', '9' ) UNION ALL SELECT '4' AS gubun ,ruby ,'' AS ruby_new ,'' AS ruby_old ,room_no ,item_type ,gifted_mem_no AS mem_no ,mem_level AS `level` ,mem_grade AS grade ,last_upd_date AS giftDate ,item_code ,item_cnt AS itemCnt ,secret ,concat('보낸 달 ',ruby) AS cont FROM rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_item WHERE mem_no=#{mem_no} and item_type = '3' UNION ALL SELECT '5' AS gubun ,ruby ,'' AS ruby_new ,'' AS ruby_old ,room_no ,item_type ,mem_no AS mem_no ,mem_level AS `level` ,mem_grade AS grade ,last_upd_date AS giftDate ,item_code ,item_cnt AS itemCnt ,secret ,concat('받은 달 ',ruby) AS cont FROM rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_item WHERE gifted_mem_no =#{mem_no} and item_type = '3' UNION ALL SELECT `type` AS gubun ,( (money_new - money_old)+(ruby_new - ruby_old) ) AS ruby ,( money_new + ruby_new ) AS ruby_new ,( money_old + ruby_old ) AS ruby_old ,'' AS room_no ,'' AS item_type ,'10000000000000' AS mem_no ,0 AS `level` ,'' AS grade ,last_upd_date AS giftDate ,'' AS item_code ,if(15 ='15',if(ruby_new !=0,1,0),1) AS itemCnt ,0 AS secret ,use_contents AS cont FROM rd_data.tb_member_wallet_ruby WHERE mem_no =#{mem_no} /*and type in (1,7,8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 22, 23,15)*/ /*and type not in (2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 14, 17, 19, 20, 32)*/ ) a LEFT JOIN rd_data.tbl_gift_item AS b ON a.item_code = b.item_code LEFT JOIN ( select mem_no, mem_userid ,mem_nick ,mem_sex, mem_birth_year, `inner` from rd_data.tb_member_basic union select mem_no, mem_userid ,mem_nick ,mem_sex, mem_birth_year, `inner` FROM rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak ) AS c ON a.mem_no = c.mem_no
AND ( a.gubun IN (1, 5, 6, 9, 10, 11,15) OR (a.gubun IN (2, 3, 7, 8, 12, 13, 22, 23) AND a.ruby > 0) )
AND ( a.gubun IN (2, 3, 4, 9, 7, 14, 17) OR (a.gubun IN (2, 3, 7, 8, 12, 13, 22, 23) AND 0 > a.ruby) )
AND a.gubun = #{slct_type}
AND a.gubun = 12
AND a.gubun = 2 and a.secret = 1
AND ( b.item_name like concat('%', #{slct_typeTxt}, '%') OR a.cont LIKE concat('%', #{slct_typeTxt}, '%') )
and DATE_FORMAT(a.giftDate, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and DATE_FORMAT(a.giftDate, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}
ORDER BY a.giftDate DESC limit #{pageStart}, #{pageCnt} ) AS r, (SELECT @rownum := #{pageStart} ) AS d

SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(gold_new - gold_old), 0) FROM rd_data.tb_member_wallet_gold where `type` in ('2', '14', '17', 19, 20) AND mem_no = #{mem_no} ) AS sum_input_cnt ,(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(gold_new - gold_old), 0) FROM rd_data.tb_member_wallet_gold where `type` in (4,5,6,7,8,21,22,23) AND mem_no = #{mem_no} ) AS sum_event_cnt ,(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(gold_new - gold_old), 0) FROM rd_data.tb_member_wallet_gold where `type` = 3 AND mem_no = #{mem_no} ) AS sum_exchange_cnt ,(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(gold_new - gold_old), 0) FROM rd_data.tb_member_wallet_gold where `type` = 1 AND mem_no = #{mem_no} ) AS sum_change_cnt ,IFNULL((SELECT IFNULL((gold_old), 0) FROM rd_data.tb_member_wallet_gold where mem_no = #{mem_no} order by last_upd_date asc limit 0, 1), IFNULL(gold, 0)) AS start_cnt ,IFNULL(gold, 0) AS sum_own_cnt FROM rd_data.tb_member_wallet WHERE mem_no = #{mem_no}

select count(*) AS totalCnt From rd_data.tb_member_wallet_ruby a left join rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_item b on a.link_idx = b.idx LEFT JOIN rd_data.tbl_gift_item c ON b.item_code = c.item_code where (link_idx > 0 or type not in (2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 14, 17, 32))
